name: AVS Spinning
goal: AVS Spinning is a production company active in textile open end spinning for different applications: interior fabrics, clothing textiles and technical textiles
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: As a European production company, AVS follows closely the policies concerning sustainability (eg recycling) and innovation in the textiles industry.
